description: This module gathers facts for a specific system using its HP iLO interface. These facts include hardware and network related information useful for provisioning (e.g. macaddress, uuid).

host.description: The HP iLO hostname/address that is linked to the physical system.

password.description: The password to authenticate to the HP iLO interface.

login.description: The login name to authenticate to the HP iLO interface.
